game.name: Replik Survivors
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 게임은 롤플레잉과 로그라이크 요소가 가미된 캐주얼 게임이다. 전투를 통해 캐릭터를 점점 더 강화하여 다가오는 적을 물리치세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This game is a time survival game with role-playing and roguelite elements. Through the choice of upgrades in battle to make the character stronger and stronger, defeat the oncoming enemies.
